title: Not in the top 100 films of all time?
review: Surely one of the mysteries of the modern world!! - this film is NOT considered to be within the top 100 films of all time????If you watched this film and thought it was anything other than wonderful please let me know how? - Al Pacino's performance is as good as it gets!

title: More than a film!
review: New law announcement!As from today it is compulsory for every school and every parent to watch this film - on the surface a film about racism - underneath the futility of anger & hatred and the terrible damage that can result from poor / misguided parentingDo not decide whether to watch this film - we are all obligated to watch and learn!#SPOILER#The scene around the breakfast table when the father is 'educating' his son on multi-culture life is as moving as scenes get!
